views.py

Defines the routes served by GOLMI's server side.  Currently, the endpoints "/", "/get_tasks/<string:taskname>" and "/save_log" are served.

Functions
index

Serve the experiment interface.

tasks

Retrieve tasks in json format.

Params
taskname

name of the task set to load, one of: ['ba_tasks']

save_log

POST json data here to save it on the server side. Each log is saved in its own file with filename generated from the timestamp.
